title: IFeature.GetCreatedVersion
description: Gets the SOLIDWORKS version number in which the selected feature was created.
returns: SOLIDWORKS version number in which feature was created (see Remarks )

To get the SOLIDWORKS version number in which the feature was last modified, use
IFeature::GetModifiedVersion
.
